title: I still can't believe that Epsom Salt is mostly water

media:group.media:title: I still can't believe that Epsom Salt is mostly water
media:group.media:description:
Start your 30-day Audible trial and get your free audiobook by going to https://www.audible.com/nilered or by texting NILERED to 500500.
-------------------------------------------

By weight, Epsom Salt is actually 53% water and this is something that has always blown my mind. It just felt way too much to be possible and I've finally decided to test it out myself.

Giveaway: https://gleam.io/hAG82/bath-salt-water-giveaway ----- The giveaway is over :(

Nile talks about lab safety: https://youtu.be/ftACSEJ6DZA
